description:
This Mid-Century style property features every nature-lovers desire; privacy, light and fresh air.

Every day is a relaxing immersion into nature, with the Sturt river located at the bottom of the property. Renowned Linear Park is on your doorstep and Apex park is a few steps away. Positioned directly next to Blackwood Reserve, enjoy total privacy with a no-through road. Just steps away from Blackwood, you can walk to the shops at your leisure.

Find serenity on this expansive 1500m2 block, with an abundance of potential for add-ons to fit your family's needs. The open floor plan gives you the freedom to create your dream space with panoramic views of lush greenery. The property has massive renovation and extension potential, though there is still plenty of space for the family with three bedrooms and 1.5 bathrooms.


Relax to the sound of the wind through the trees when you're falling asleep each night. With plenty of space and large gums surrounding the dwelling, the sounds of the city will be filtered through the birds and trees.

Enjoy the feel of natural, wooden floorboards beneath your feet. The light palette allows the natural light to brighten every space.

Freshly painted white rooms create a canvas for your creativity and decor, ready for you to bring your personality. The bedroom space is maximised with inconspicuous built-in wardrobes that keep the space flowing. Plenty of cupboard space and built-in storage throughout so you can keep the space minimal if you desire. Ceiling fans keep the air moving and ensure a cool night's sleep.

The master bedroom boasts a luxuriously large walk-in wardrobe and stunning bathroom, for you to enjoy. The second toilet can be used by guests and is located at the front of the house, to keep your personal space private.

Open-plan living with a nature immersion you can see from every room. Keep the conversation flowing while you practise your culinary skills with ease in the spacious kitchen.

Wake up to fresh, natural light every day through the floor-to-ceiling windows.

The modern Mediterranean-style bathroom adds character to your space while remaining crisp and bright. An enormous shower-bath caters for both a quick rinse and a luxurious soak.

Advanced gardens require minimal watering, with beautiful variation of native gums and colourful wattles. Your backyard potential is endless, add in a stunning outdoor entertainment area and enjoy your own private sanctuary to share with friends and family.

There's a single car garage to lock up your car and with minimal traffic, you will also have plenty of access to street parking.


Features:

Open-plan living room
Baltic Pine Wooden floorboards
Built-in wardrobes
Master bedroom walk-in wardrobe
Large windows with beautiful borrowed landscape view
Private location
Sturt river located at the base of the property
Walking distance to Blackwood, Apex park and Coromandel Primary School



HARCOURTS PILGRIM
RLA 275886
